nodes.text: The ARC-40b Scout-Reconnaissance Fighter was a medium escort fighter for ARC-170s. It carried a crew of three. Most were destroyed during the Clone Wars, or were scrapped by the Imperial Navy, although many still serve in the Outer Rim in mercenary units or with surveyors during the Imperial Period.
The ARC-40b Scout-Reconnaissance Fighter is mentioned in Fantasy Flight Games' 2016 roleplaying game sourcebook Savage Spirits.
